item.title: Getting started
item.description: Setup Ernest In this quickstart guide we will build a simple environment consisting of a public server and private server on AWS, and allow SSH access from our IP. You will need a working copy of Ernest and the Ernest CLI, your AWS Access Key and Secret Key. Get Ernest Follow the instructions here to get Ernest and the Ernest CLI. Setup Your User Target your Ernest instance: $ ernest target https://10.
